56677.「……って お前さん 見ない顔じゃな。\n もしや わしの技師としてのウデを見込:
Who are you? Did ya come to offer me a job
'cause of my engineerin' skills?

56678.「じゃが 残念ー！ ワシは技師を辞めて\n 隠居生活を 満喫チューなのじゃ！\n:
Alas! This ol' engineer is enjoyin'
retirement! Don't need a job no more.

56680.「ふ…ふんっ！ エイブラムなんて 知らんもん！\n 知らんって言ったら 知らんも:
H...hmph! I don't know no Abram! And when I
say I don't know, I don't dang know!!

56682.「もう エイブラムなんて 知らんもん！\n 知らんって言ったら 知らんもん！！:
Hmph... I don't know no Abram! When I say I
don't know, I don't dang know!!

56684.「これは…… ワシの仕事道具……！\n しかも なんじゃ？ 壊れたスパナの代わり:
These... these are my old tools! And what's
this? A High-Tech Wrench instead of a broken
one...?

56685.「くっ！ エイブラムめ！ なんで\n ワシの愛用のスパナを 取り替えたんじゃ！？:
Darn it, Abram! Why'd ya replace my beloved
wrench with this fancy-schmancy high tech
one?!

56686.「ワシが あのスパナに\n どれほどの愛着を持っていたか！ 壊れたら直し\n 古:
I loved that wrench! I used it to fix it when
it wore down, enjoying its old-fashioned
feeling!

56690.「勝手なことをするな……か。\n そう言えば アイツも ケンカした時\n 同じこ:
"What a selfish, no good"... Come ta' think of
it, he said the same thing when we argued til
the cows came home.

56691.「……そうか。\n アイツは こんな気持ちじゃったのか。: I see... So that's how he felt.

56693.「エイブラムめ こしゃくなマネを！\n オーケー オーケー！ ワシも 悪かったわ:
Abram, ya jerk! Okay, okay... I'm sorry too!
It was me in the first place!

56694.「そう……。ワシは あのエイブラムが\n 何より愛する グランドタイタス号の心臓:
That's right... I messed with the Grand Titus'
heart, which Abram loves more than anything
else... the power unit.

56695.「修理の時…… ワシは ヤツのためを思い\n あの船が 迷いの霧の嵐にも耐えられ:
When it came time for repairs, I helped by
installin' a state of the art power source
that'd allow the ship to withstand the mist.

56696.「なのに アイツときたら 船の最大の\n ミリョクである 武骨で味わいのある動力:
And then he got mad at me for turning the
power unit into a high-tech piece of machinery
without his permission!

56697.「あんときは なんて了見のせまいヤツじゃ！ と\n 怒りにまかせ 工具かばんをほ:
What a pinheaded guy he was back then! I got
so mad, I got off the ship and left my tools
behind!

56698.「同じことをされて ワシもわかった。\n よかれと思ってやったことが\n 相手を:
But I finally understood after the same thing
was done to me. Even your best intentions can
still offend others.

56699.「まあ これで おあいこじゃ！\n かばんを届けてくれたのは 技師を続けろという:
Well, now we're even! I guess the bag was
Abram's way of tellin' me to keep bein' an
engineer.

56700.「さて……まずは この 技師の工具かばんで\n たまった仕事を片付けることから:
Well, let's start by cleanin' up this mess
inside the bag. Hmm? Speaking of which...

56701.「グランゼドーラ城の例の装置も そろそろ……。\n おっと！ すまん こっちの話:
I think it's time to fix that device at Gran
Zedora Castle. Oops! Sorry for my ramblin'!
Give my regards to Abram!

56702.「チャオー！\n 天才技師バジェオの家に ようこそー！:
Ciao! Welcome to the home of the genius
engineer, Bajeo!

56703.「……っと お前さんか。\n いつぞやは 世話になったのう。:
Oh, you again? You did help me out quite a
bit the other day.

56704.「エイブラムのヤツは 相変わらず素直じゃなくて\n わざわざ スパナを交換して:
Abram, still just as dishonest as ever, went
through the trouble of replacing my wrench
and then delivering it to me...

56705.「工具が戻ってきて 正直 助かった。\n グランゼドーラ城の あの装置も そろそ:
Glad my tools are back! Now it's time to get
back to Gran Zedora and fix that equipment in
need of maintenance!

56706.「さすがは エイブラム！\n バッチリ グッドな タイミングじゃったぞい！\n:
That's what I'm talking about, Abram! Perfect
timing! Well, give my regards to him,
won'tcha?
